definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
lit. to prescribe the right medicine for an illness (idiom); fig. to study a problem to find the right way to solve it/to take appropriate steps
stubborn illness/disease that is difficult to treat
correct diagnosis/to prescribe the right cure for an illness/to suit the medicine to the illness

sentences.english: The former chief has got typhus fever on board.
sentences.chinese: 前任大副在船得過斑疹傷寒症。

sentences.english: MethodsBoth eyes of 68 children with leukocoria were examined with CT scan.
sentences.chinese: 方法對68例兒童白瞳症患者進行雙眼CT掃描檢查。

sentences.english: Panic disorder, for example, gives way to sudden attacks of terror.
sentences.chinese: 比如，恐慌症，總是出現突然的恐慌。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical and electroencephalographic characteristics of automatism.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析癲自動症的臨牀和腦電圖特徵。

sentences.english: Trypanosoma brucei is the hemoflagellate that causes sleeping sickness.
sentences.chinese: 布氏錐蟲是一種造成嗜睡症的血鞭毛蟲。

sentences.english: lot of people have parasomnias in childhood and grow out ofit.
sentences.chinese: 很多人在童年時得了類睡症，長大後就好了。

sentences.english: Objective To study clinical presentations and complications of prolapse of gastric mucosa.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討胃黏膜脫垂症的臨牀表現及其併發症。

sentences.english: Since 1990,46 patients have underwent surgical management of Tetralogy of Fallot.
sentences.chinese: 自1990年以來，共行法樂氏四聯症根治術46例。

sentences.english: It was a classic case of economically counterproductive xenophobia.
sentences.chinese: 這是經濟方面反生產仇外症的經典案例。

sentences.english: He is dyslexic and a college dropout.
sentences.chinese: 他有誦讀困難症，還是一名大學退學生。

sentences.english: LEHRER: What do you think are the biggest public misconceptions of Alzheimer's disease?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲，什麼是公衆對於阿爾茨海默症最大的誤區？

sentences.english: Hirsutism is frequently a result of PCOS.
sentences.chinese: 多毛症常常是多囊卵巢綜合徵的結果。

sentences.english: It reviewed the progress on etiopathogenisis of non-traumatic rhabdomyolysis (NRML) patients and their nursing.
sentences.chinese: 綜述了非創傷性橫紋肌溶解症的病因及護理進展。

sentences.english: RA have became one of the hard disease in the modern medicine field.
sentences.chinese: RA已成爲現代醫學難治病症之一。

sentences.english: Objeective To summarize the clinical of infectious mononucleosis(IM) in adult patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析傳染性單核細胞增多症的臨牀特徵及治療。
